CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1946, pg. 9, reads: "Throngs Expected at Beauty Shop Owners' Revue - Last Call for Glamour!  April 9 is the date set for the annual Beauty Shop Owners' Association fashion revue at Schenley High School and all the lovely ladies and kiddies above will appear in the the show which promises to be the best yet... Center: Jean Mason writes in her diary, around which centers the fashion revue... - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Jean Mason wearing two-piece outfit and seated at dressing table with photograph of man in hat
